mapper.sql: id, uid, province_id, city_id, district_id, link_man, address, mobile, code, is_default, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from address a where a.uid = #{uid} and a.status = 1

select
from address a where a.uid = #{uid} and a.status = 1 and a.is_default = 1 order by a.create_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into address ( uid, province_id, city_id, district_id, link_man, address, mobile, code, is_default, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{vo.uid},#{vo.provinceId},#{vo.cityId},#{vo.districtId},#{vo.linkMan}, #{vo.address},#{vo.mobile} ,#{vo.code},#{vo.isDefault},#{vo.status}, now(), now());
mapper.update: UPDATE address a set a.is_default = #{isDefault} where a.uid = #{uid}
